MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of Waverton, causing flickering supplies, affecting properties in Ringway, Fox Lane, Egg Bridge Lane, and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:10 am. Our engineers  are on site investigating the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by  11:15 am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:59 am on 20th January, 2021.
